name: Ultimate Electric Sheep of Robotic Doom
name_original: Ultimate Electric Sheep of Robotic Doom
description:
Ultimate Electric Sheep of Robotic Doom is a casual fighting game where you control a sheep with powers that must save the city from an evil robot invasion.

                                                                                                                  

Features :

  • Play as a powerful sheep
  • Destroy waves of robots with your electric powers

Controls :

  • Use right or left arrow to attack.

                                                                                                                 

This game was made in 5 days by 3 students from e-artsup Paris in their 2nd Year of Game Art and Creative Coding during a game jam.

CREATIVE CODING :

Kyllian BONNIER (Programming)

REMY Andy (Programming, Animators)

GAME ARTIST :

Andrea DI MARZIO (Sprites, Animations, Particles, UI, ....)
